name: Tulum Coffee
description:
Our range includes a curation of the best specialty coffees Ideated in Brazil | Learnt in Mexico | Founded in India (This is a note written by Pallav Haria, Founder) I was an Exchange student Living in Sao Paulo, Brazil (2013-14).
Tulum is a coffee company specialising in coffees sourced from Indian farms.
I had just finished schooling and had travelled there to live their life, to learn about their culture.
